attributes.action: Stop quarterly MTD submissions as it will damage UK economy & small businesses
attributes.additional_details: I want Government to free up the economy so that small and new startup businesses can flourish
attributes.background: Stop HMRC implementing MTD regulations in April 2026 and reduce the red tape and future planned obligations on small businesses at a time when small businesses are struggling all round the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729235
